subject: [OT] Re: Attempting to update files blanks them instead
body:
Hello Chas,

All your replies are lately posted twice, and have a strange Newsgroups:
header line.

  Newsgroups: perl.beginners,perl.beginners

For example:

Message-ID:
<58ce48dc0705140748v32e237derf46c3fc6c8d07bf6@mail.gmail.com>


A diff between the two messages (with the same Message-ID, but with
different SMTP ids) shows this:

7c7
< Received: (qmail 21537 invoked from network); 14 May 2007
15:00:06 -0000
---
> Received: (qmail 9565 invoked from network); 14 May 2007
14:52:29 -0000

9,10c9,10
<   by lists.develooper.com with SMTP; 14 May 2007 15:00:06 -0000
< Received: (qmail 7553 invoked by uid 225); 14 May 2007 15:00:06 -0000
---
>   by lists.develooper.com with SMTP; 14 May 2007 14:52:29 -0000
> Received: (qmail 4594 invoked by uid 225); 14 May 2007 14:52:28 -0000

12c12
< Received: (qmail 7543 invoked by alias); 14 May 2007 15:00:04 -0000
---
> Received: (qmail 4580 invoked by alias); 14 May 2007 14:52:26 -0000

16,20c16,20
< Received-SPF: pass (x1.develooper.com: domain of chas.owens@gmail.com
designates 64.233.162.239 as permitted sender)
< Received: from nz-out-0506.google.com (HELO nz-out-0506.google.com)
(64.233.162.239)
<     by la.mx.develooper.com (qpsmtpd/0.28) with ESMTP; Mon, 14 May
2007 07:58:50 -0700
< Received: by nz-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id x7so460432nzc
<         for ; Mon, 14 May 2007 07:58:46 -0700
(PDT)
---
> Received-SPF: pass (x1.develooper.com: domain of chas.owens@gmail.com
designates 64.233.162.238 as permitted sender)
> Received: from nz-out-0506.google.com (HELO nz-out-0506.google.com)
(64.233.162.238)
>     by la.mx.develooper.com (qpsmtpd/0.28) with ESMTP; Mon, 14 May
2007 07:48:51 -0700
> Received: by nz-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id x7so456657nzc
>         for ; Mon, 14 May 2007 07:48:46 -0700
(PDT)


so nz-out-0506.google.com (which has 2 IP-nrs) hands it over twice, with
exactly 10 minutes in between, which could be SMTP related.
But that still doesn't explain why the newsgroup name is twice in the
Newsgroups: header line.

-- 
Affijn, Ruud

"Gewoon is een tijger."


-- 
To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
http://learn.perl.org/
